body: Apologies if this is in the wrong part of the forum, but how do I change my name on here? I haven't been kyoppman for a long time.
body_tagged: Apologies if this is in the wrong part of the forum, but how do I change my name on here? I haven't been kyoppman for a long time.
title: Updating name.

replies.body: If you've already changed your Minecraft name, you're gonna have to log onto the Avicus server in order for it to change on the forums.
replies.body_tagged: If you've already changed your Minecraft name, you're gonna have to log onto the Avicus server in order for it to change on the forums.

replies.body: I have logged into the server with my new name and it is not reflected in my profile here.
replies.body_tagged: I have logged into the server with my new name and it is not reflected in my profile here.

replies.body: probably cos you havent changed your name lol??
replies.body_tagged: probably cos you havent changed your name lol??

replies.body:
This would be because you haven't chnaged your name. https://namemc.com/profile/Kyoppman.1
You have to login to Mojang and firstly Migrate your account because your status reads
"Status: Unmigrated"

Then you can change your username
replies.body_tagged:
This would be because you haven't chnaged your name. https://namemc.com/profile/Kyoppman.1
